CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: These results indicate that the PCEs of the photovoltaic devices based on PDTP-DT2BT : PC 70 BM were higher than those of PDTP - DTBT : PC 70 BM and PDTP-BT : PC 70 BM.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the Material Name entities in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DT2BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-BT |
| PC 70 BM |

Note that "PC 70 BM" is mentioned thrice in the paragraph, but it's still considered as one unique Material Name entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid Material Name entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DT2BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-BT |

I removed "PC 70 BM" from the list as it's not a material name, but rather a component or ingredient used in the production of the photovoltaic devices.
